lst.name: sentence
lst.str: One political analyst, who declined to be identified, said Nakasone, despite a personal preference for Miyazawa, is likely to choose Abe as the best candidate for steering Japan through its international problems and maintaining party unity.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: No clear indication has emerged of the victor in the race to succeed Prime Minister Yasuhiro Nakasone but political analysts said it was becoming more likely that former foreign minister Shintaro Abe would be chosen.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Takeshita, who is head of the party's largest faction, had steadfastly opposed the idea of seeking Nakasone's help, but he told reporters: "It is possible Nakasone will be given carte blanche (for selection of his successor)."
